name: Rotaball
description:
In ROTABALL you control the environment not the player.

Simply TAP or HOLD to rotate obstacles around the ball
as it travels downwards.

If you touch any of the objects, you die! How far can you get?

FEATURES:

• Tons of Characters to Unlock
• 24 Challenge Levels
• Endless Mode
• Unique Gameplay
• Minimal Graphics & Music
